briefTitle: A Study to Explore the Existence of Horizontal Transmission of the RIX4414 Vaccine Strain Between Twins Within a Family.
officialTitle: A Phase IIIb, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Explore the Existence of Horizontal Transmission of the RIX4414 Vaccine Strain Between Twins Within a Family.
summary: The aim of this study is to explore horizontal transmission of the HRV (Human Rotavirus) vaccine strain within a family from the twin vaccinated with Rotarix to the twin receiving placebo. The Protocol Posting has been updated in order to comply with the FDA Amendment Act, Sep 2007.

primaryOutcome.measure: Presence of Rotavirus Vaccine Strain in Any Stool Sample From Twin Receiving Placebo.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: On the day of each vaccine/placebo dose, then three times weekly for 6 consecutive weeks starting after each vaccine/placebo dose and on the day of Visit 3.
